location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with a large section of text missing in its top left corner.

mods.abstract: Letter discusses administrative and financial matters. Shipped by Ibrahim Carack boat.The letter's full date is obscured by damage to the item.
